dct_title_s: Hudson River New York Harbor, 2 sheets, sheet no. 1, from Castle Point to Edgewater, Harbor Lines from surveys of 1911-13
dct_description_sm: Map of proposed pierhead and bulkhead lines in the Hudson River, Bergen County, New Jersey from Castle Point to Edgewater; also adjacent shoreline of New York City, New York
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Map is drawn from a composite of measurements from other charts ranging from 1902 - 1912
